mapper.select: select id,name from blog.t_tag where id=#{id};
select id,name from blog.t_tag where name=#{name};
mapper.update: update blog.t_tag set name=#{name} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select t_tag.id id,t_tag.`name`,count(*) as num from t_tag,t_tag_blog,t_blog where t_tag.id=t_tag_blog.tag_id and t_tag_blog.blog_id=t_blog.id and t_blog.published=true GROUP BY t_tag.id ORDER BY num desc limit #{size}
select t_tag.id id,t_tag.`name` FROM t_tag,t_tag_blog where t_tag.id=t_tag_blog.tag_id and t_tag_blog.blog_id = #{id}

SELECT t_tag.id id,t_tag.`name`,IFNULL(b.num,0) num from t_tag left join( SELECT t_tag_blog.tag_id id,COUNT(1) num from t_tag_blog,t_blog where t_tag_blog.blog_id=t_blog.id and t_blog.published=true GROUP BY t_tag_blog.tag_id ) b on t_tag.id=b.id
